description: Details and specification of Biomass Boiler pursuant of condition 18 of planning permission P/2010/1837 dated 17 August 2010 for the demolition of four buildings and caretaker's house and parts of two buildings, relocation of two storey portable building with ramp and external staircase from the South East corner to the North West corner to the rear of the car park, erection of four storey building fronting Greenford Road, returned along the Southern boundary to incorporate and extend the indoor sports facilities, alterations and remodelling of existing building in centre of site including ground and first floor central extension, alterations including the provision of canopies to building in the South East corner, alterations and erection of first floor link and external staircases to two buildings on East side of site, relocation of vehicular and pedestrian access from Greenford Road, rearrangement of car parking to provide 68 spaces, including 3 disabled spaces, partly extending into Parish Centre site and provision of covered cycle parking, hardsurfacing including sports facilities, incidental structures and features, sections of fencing and wall and formation of layby on Greenford Depot access road for servicing and refuse/recycling collection from site
